snippet: Gov. Pat McCrory signed into law on Monday a Republican-backed requirement that voters present photo identification at the polls.
abstract: North Carolina Gov Pat McCory signs into law a Republican-backed requirement that voters present photo identification at polls.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Pat McCrory signed into law on Monday a Republican-backed requirement that voters present photo identification at the polls.

headline.main: North Carolina: Governor Signs Voter ID Law
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Governor Signs Voter ID Law
